name: Holiday Inn Oceanside Marina

reviews.text: We found this last minute and the rate was great. We walked to the Marina for dinner, it was that close. Great experience and will recommend this hotel in the future. Beautiful granite throughout the room. Atleast a 42" flat screen for our enjoyment. We also like the separate room for the shower and toilet. Bob M.
reviews.title: Very clean and great location!

reviews.text: Youthful yet extremely competent staff, friendly and helpful throughout the three-night stay. Convenient location--short hop to Interstate 5 and a short walk to Oceanside Harbor with nice views and popular dining. I tried Rockin Baja Lobster & outdoor cafe Nautical Bean Coffee and liked both. It's one mile to Eighties-themed Breakfast Club Diner (recommended). Decent omelets also available in the hotel--friendly service, and restaurant booths are even equipped w/ TV's.
reviews.title: Super Staff, Good Location, Clean

reviews.text: Off-season rates were very reasonable. I'd definitely recommend the place, probably the cleanest, friendliest Holiday Inn I've ever stayed in. I wouldn't hesitate to book it again.
reviews.title: Good clean hotel

reviews.text: Overall it was a nice clean hotel. My room was spacious and comfortable. The only issue I had was a couple of other guest on my floor decided to have an argument at 2am. I reported it to the front desk. The evening bartender was excellent and the happy hour meal was a great value. The party I was traveling with ate them out of all of their chicken wings. The hotel is a short walk to the beach and a spectacular sunset. This hotel is a great proximity to Camp Pendleton.
reviews.title: One night stay

reviews.text: Overall good hotel for one night stay. The lobby and entrance to the lobby is not very appealing. However service was excellent. Everyone from waitress to lobby staff were pleasant and helpful
reviews.title: I LOVE STAYING !!

reviews.text: A great experience with the Holiday Inn. Didn't have a reservation, just walked in. Staff at desk was very nice. Large clean room. Comfortable Bed. Quiet, can't hear the neighbors. Will stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice Option

reviews.text: I've stayed at this hotel over a half dozen times. It continues to surprise me as to how nice the staff is and what a great value this property is in an area that is usually pretty expense.
reviews.title: Best secret (not anymore) in north San Diego coast

reviews.text: Rooms are immaculate - have lots of space and include a large updated flat screen HD-TV
reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service

reviews.text: Its one of the nicest (and affordable) 3star properties. Highly recommended
reviews.title: Back again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lead by Mr. Parkford, General Manager, the whole team makes sure every need is addtessed. Outststanding venue for business or pleasure. Business center services a plus. Internet access speed is consistently good too. Walking distance to the beach and Harbor at Oceanside.
reviews.title: Very nice, newer hotel. Outstanding STAFF!

reviews.text: From the time we walked in the hotel to check in, until we checked out, everything was perfect.
reviews.title: Great Stay!!

reviews.text: Wonderful, friendly front desk staff! Exceptional staff that keeps the place super clean! Free laundry! Small but functional exercise room (only advice for hotel is to add sanitary wipes in the gym.) Close to marina, ocean, and dining in the marina! Great room service! Spacious rooms!
reviews.title: Friendly staff, convenient location
Nice and Roomy!
reviews.text: Everything was GREAT... and I am super picky! Highly reccomend this Hotel.

Room: Stayed in a junior suite for 4 days, room was clean and spacious with 2 queen-size beds and pull out couch. Really liked the cotton-based shower curtain liner - easy to wash so no soap scum or mold. Lacking towel racks next to sink and lighting in room was not good.
reviews.title: Nice stay when it's warmer

reviews.text: Lobby:Coffee and fresh fruit available 24 hours so easy to grab a cup and an orange on the go.
reviews.title: Excellent customer service, very clean rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great time staying at the Holiday Inn in Oceanside. We were walking distance from the Harbor and were able to enjoy the nice weather, beach, and great sunset views. The staff were very pleasant and help. Our room was modern and very clean. Since this was a "staycation" - we did spend time lounging and watching movies - lucky there was a great big television. We were also able to access the Oceanside nightlife nearby on Mission just off the Coast Highway. A short drive gave us many options of dining - however, we landed back at the Hotel and ventured to the nearby Harbor for drinks and dinner. Our stay was relaxing and it was just the break we needed.
reviews.title: Relaxing Times at the Holiday Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose this hotel based on other Trip Advisor reviews, and they were right. It's close to restaurants at the harbour - which is a pleasant 10-minute walk from the hotel. Convenient access to the pier, highway, Carlsbad, La Jolla, and the rest of the area. Our room was large, quiet, clean and comfortable. Jeff at the front desk was really friendly. Reservations staff was also helpful and personable when we called to book. Thanks!
reviews.title: Convenient, clean, nice rooms, nice staff

reviews.text: I had about 10 family members come into town recently and they were treated very well and I really appreciate that. They loved their rooms and room service. The view was lovely and the beds were comfy. They loved walking around the harbor and enjoying the happy service they received from Geoff and his staff. My grandmother has kept saying "I like that young man" Thanks Geoff and supporting staff for making my family feel at home.
reviews.title: Beautiful View, Great Rooms, Great CUSTOMER SERVICE

reviews.text: We selected this hotel with only 24 hours notice due to dissatisfaction with the hotel we started with. The staff members here were incredibly helpful, always cheerful, and went above and beyond. They offered instructions on the best route to walk to the beach and were extremely friendly without being intrusive. We went in February so it was cool weather. I went to the outside jacuzzi and it was lovely. The wi-fi was easy to access and use. Had breakfast at the little on-site restaurant and it was absolutely delicious. Great place to stay!
reviews.title: Great experience and helpful staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved the area. It is right off the freeway and Mapquest was perfect getting us there. Next door is a Denny's if you want their breakfast instead of Holiday Inn's. That was the only part of the stay where we felt it was not worth it. We shared an omelette and ended up spending $20 for brekkie. Service was very slow. No idea if it was the waitress or kitchen at fault. Only a couple of other tables at 9 am so I don't think they should have been overwhelmed.
reviews.title: What a great surprise!

aka: Holiday Inn Oceanside Marina Hotel Oceanside
description: Located in the Oceanside Marina area, the Holiday Inn features 110 guest rooms and Jr suites. On site heated outdoor pool/spa, fitness center, full service restaurant and bar. Covered parking.
